response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our clients' needs and desires, and we are confident that this product will exceed your expectations. For a limited time, we are offering this extraordinary item at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional value considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. We trust that you will find this offer irresistible and hope to hear from you soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
